title: WANTED T205's AB and Cycle backed
author: Pup6913

posts.post_title: WANTED T205's AB and Cycle backed
posts.post_content:
Looking for any T205's graded or raw with the following backs for now:

American Beauty  B+G
Cycle
Pied. Fact 42

Putting together a small group of cards for display.  I am looking for 10 of each of the following cards.  Some of which I already have almost knocked out and will try to update ASAP

The 17 backs are:

American Beauty Black 
American Beauty Green 
Broad Leaf Black 
Broad Leaf Green 
Cycle 
Drum 
Hassan Factory 30 
Hassan Factory 649 
Hindu 
Honest Long Cut 
Piedmont Factory 25 
Piedmont Factory 42 
Polar Bear 
Sovereign 
Sweet Caporal Factory 25 Black 
Sweet Caporal Factory 42 Black 
Sweet Caporal Red

Broadleaf can be had for a reasonable price still...drum and blank backs will cost you a small fortune. Do you have a Hindu yet?

BTW, with the recent Drum find, blank backs have become the rarest T205 back. I have only seen a handful ever.

Joshua

Ah yes,  a project after my own heart!

You might want to drop my dad (henryjlevy@yahoo.com) a line....he often has extra T205s in his stash.

Good luck with the project!
-Scott
